revised_title: A New Genus of Plants: Araliastrum and Aralia
tldr: The author introduces a new genus of plants called Araliastrum, which includes the famous Chinese plant, Nin-zin or Ginseng. He also compares it to the Aralia genus and describes their characteristics, such as their flowers, berries, and leaves. The author mentions the medicinal properties of these plants, including their use in treating ulcers and anasarca.
